entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
